hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BLL_BUILD_NUMBER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is used to pass a common build number to all IL and BLL build jobs run during the nightly build process.

scm.projectOptions: noallwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
env p4 info
echo Clean up prior to extracting tarballs
# make the version file writeable chmod 777 $WORKSPACE/build/il/version
# need to remove information in repos directory and packages directory rm -rf $WORKSPACE/build/il/repos/* rm -rf $WORKSPACE/build/il/bld_appliance sudo scons target=packageclean
rm -f $WORKSPACE/*.txt
# 2016-01-18: Temporary for 4.61, unshelve Ramana's change to fix AV l4l7vm version issue # cp -f /home/spirent/appliance_usb /home/spirent/jenkins-rel/workspace/release_cxx_amara_usb_yocto1.5/build/il/scripts/targets/appliance_usb

echo 'Creating C1/C100 USB image (Appliance)' rm -rf $WORKSPACE/framework/il/kernel/yocto/spirent-linux $WORKSPACE/build/il/scripts/phxbld -j32 yocto_ver=1.5 appliance_hypervisor $WORKSPACE/build/il/scripts/phxbld -j32 yocto_ver=1.5 appliance_usb sudo $WORKSPACE/build/il/scripts/reversion_il.sh ${STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION}.${BLL_BUILD_NUMBER}${BRANCH_ID} ${AV_BUILD_NUMBER} $WORKSPACE/build/il/scripts/phxbld -j32 yocto_ver=1.5 il_version=${STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION}.${BLL_BUILD_NUMBER}${BRANCH_ID} usbimg_cxxx rm -rf $WORKSPACE/framework/il/kernel/yocto/Install/usbimg_cxxx-1.5.img.gz gzip $WORKSPACE/framework/il/kernel/yocto/Install/usbimg_cxxx-1.5.img

echo 'Creating Amara/Controller3 USB image (Yocto 1.5)' $WORKSPACE/build/il/scripts/phxbld -j32 yocto_ver=1.5 c3_hypervisor $WORKSPACE/build/il/scripts/phxbld -j32 yocto_ver=1.5 c3_usb rm -rf $WORKSPACE/framework/il/kernel/yocto/Install/usb_amara-1.5.img.gz gzip $WORKSPACE/framework/il/kernel/yocto/Install/usb_amara-1.5.img rm -rf $WORKSPACE/framework/il/kernel/yocto/Install/usbimg_cxxx_x11-1.5.img.gz gzip $WORKSPACE/framework/il/kernel/yocto/Install/usbimg_cxxx_x11-1.5.img

export RSYNCUSER=scm export BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR=$WORKSPACE export MARTIN_ROOT=/spirent/data/archive/pv/TestCenter export MARTIN=martin.spirentcom.com export RAW_BLDSTR=${BLL_BUILD_NUMBER}${BRANCH_ID} printf -v BLDNUMBER "%04d" $RAW_BLDSTR export BLDNBR=${STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION}.${BLDNUMBER} export BUILD_DIR=$MARTIN_ROOT/$STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION/Engineering_Builds/IL/$BLDNBR
ssh ${RSYNCUSER}@${MARTIN} mkdir -p $BUILD_DIR/usbimg rsync -avz $BUILD_OUTPUT_DIR/framework/il/kernel/yocto/Install/usb*1.5*.img.gz ${RSYNCUSER}@${MARTIN}:$BUILD_DIR/usbimg
